description: Retrieves a schema by the SchemaDefinition. The schema definition is sent to the Schema Registry, canonicalized, and hashed. If the hash is matched within the scope of the SchemaName or ARN (or the default registry, if none is supplied), that schema's metadata is returned. Otherwise, a 404 or NotFound error is returned. Schema versions in Deleted statuses will not be included in the results.

parameters.name: SchemaId
parameters.description: This is a wrapper structure to contain schema identity fields. The structure contains: SchemaId$SchemaArn: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the schema. One of SchemaArn or SchemaName has to be provided. SchemaId$SchemaName: The name of the schema. SchemaArn (string) --- The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the schema. SchemaName (string) --- The name of the schema. RegistryName (string) --- The name of the schema registry that contains the schema.

parameters.name: SchemaDefinition
parameters.description: The definition of the schema for which schema details are required.

nested_items.name: SchemaVersionId
nested_items.description: The schema ID of the schema version.

nested_items.name: SchemaArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the schema.

nested_items.name: DataFormat
nested_items.description: The data format of the schema definition. Currently AVRO, JSON and PROTOBUF are supported.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the schema version.

nested_items.name: CreatedTime
nested_items.description: The date and time the schema was created.
